snippet: Prosecutors said Monday that the bodies had been found inside a burned-out vehicle registered in the name of one of the two missing men.
abstract: Mexican prosecutors in Sinaloa say vehicle found with two charred bodies inside was one that was registered in name of Australian citizen Adam Coleman; Coleman and fellow Australian Dean Lucas have been missing  since November 21.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said Monday that the bodies had been found inside a burned-out vehicle registered in the name of one of the two missing men.

headline.main: Mexico: Charred Bodies in Van May Be Those of Missing Australian Tourists
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Charred Bodies in Van May Be Those of Missing Australian Tourists
